original_text: I say this to you people who try to obey the rules of God's Law. If you think that God will accept you as right because you do that, you have turned away from Christ. You no longer agree to accept God's kind gift.
korean_text: 율법 안에서 의롭다 함을 얻으려 하는 너희는 그리스도에게서 끊어지고 은혜에서 떨어진 자로다

sentences.original_text: I say this to you people
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 너희 사람들에게 이 말을 합니다

sentences.original_text: who try to obey the rules of God's Law
If you think that God will accept you as right
you have turned away from Christ
You no longer agree to accept
sentences.korean_translation: 너는 더 이상 받아들이는 것에 동의하지 않습니다
